events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has indicated a request related to money back and refund process for their recent order.
Assigning the refund request to the customer service representative for immediate attention.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process it quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was not as described on the website, and I would like to return it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Great, I appreciate your quick help. I'll send the item back as soon as I receive the label.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
We are closing this case now. Please reach out again if you have any further questions or concerns.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on this refund experience.
